pages.text: A basic way of replenishing the $(thing)Aura$() in an area are $(item)Ancient Trees$(). Once an $(item)Ancient Sapling$() is created, it will grow like a normal tree, but its leaves will start increasing the $(thing)Aura$() levels back to normal slowly.$(br)The tree, however, does not fare well during this process: As its leaves' $(thing)Aura$() is drained into the world, the leaves start dying, leaving the tree bare if enough is drained.
Creating the $(item)Ancient Sapling$() using the $(l:naturesaura:practices/tree_ritual)Ritual of the Forest$()
